name: KOMPETE
description: KOMPETE Token is the official marketplace utility token for the KOMPETE Bazaar, an in-game secondary marketplace to buy and sell KOMPETE cosmetics. KOMPETE is a team-based multiplayer game that's free to play. Initial game modes include Battle Royale, Kart Racing, Golf, & Basketball. More game modes are to be released in the future. The developer of KOMPETE is Modernize Games.
